Articles.Content:
I'm trying to use the Making History installer from the KSP store to instal the expansion in KSP 1.4.3

After installing, a number of issues appear.

Buttons that are supposed to close windows (like clicking accept in the settings menu, or clicking ok on the warning about timewarping above x2 in atmosphere) does not work.

Music no longer plays in the main menu.

The game becomes unstable and will sometimes crash (something I have never experienced with ksp before)

The parts from the expansion are not present in the game. Loading a mission which is supposed to contain the new parts will cause an error message.

 

I have heard others talk of using a .zip of the expansion, but I don't know where to download the .zip. The store only offers me to download an installer.

 

Any help would be appreciated.

I use Steam, so installing the DLC is pressing one button for me.  I don't know if the KSP store offers a .zip or not.  However, if you can get the KSP installer to "install" the DLC to anywhere, you should be able to simply drag the entire folder "SquadExpansion" into KSP/GameData.   It works just like a mod, installwise.  Report back with how you make out.

It appears to be working now.

This time I tried installing ksp 1.4.3 from the installer, instead of using the .zip I usually download each version.

I don't know if it is because of some difference between the installer and the .zip, but it appears to be working now.
